name: Tonsor Har Megiddo
description:
"I don't want my fangs too long." The customer would come to regret this request. In Tonsor Har Megiddo, you are a barber surgeon who also happens to be a cult leader trying to gather a following. 

Pull your customers’ teeth and hair from its roots to get the ideal cultist. Try to get as many cultists as you can before getting 3 red flags. nemA.

Made for Global Game Jam 2023 by Nisan Gunes Elci and Ilkyaz Akbulut a.k.a Nostro Dis Pater
